attributes.action: Make nhs prescriptions free for those on lower incomes & not depending on where you live
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Abolish free prescriptions for people living in scotland and wales and make prescriptions free for those on lower incomes anywhere in the UK, the present system of free prescriptions for people in wales and scotland is aimed at eradicating poverty but not every one in scotland and wales is poor so it should be free for people on lower incomes everywhere to help eradicate poverty in the UK ("England", scotland and wales)

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
